text: Hi! We ’ re Winky Lux. We make makeup magic. Here in NYC we ’ re striving to delight you with new trends, innovative packaging and luxurious ingredients. We ’ re saying “ Boy Bye ” to parabens, sulfates, gluten, phthalates and animal testing. Our cruelty free, high pigment colors are designed to give you all the feels while providing real results. You ’ re a QUEEN, you deserve all the pretty things. We ’ re here to make them for you. Love you mean it, Team WINKY LUX
